title: Every Young Man's Battle (Christian Documentary)
description:
Every Young Man's Battle (Christian Documentary)

Every Young Man's Battle documents the problem of pornography and sexual temptation faced by teenage and young adult males. TheyÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢re everywhereÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“on TV, billboards, magazines, music, the internetÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“and so easy to access that it sometimes feels impossible to escape their clutches. Steve Arterburn and Fred Stoeker, the authors of the hard-hitting best-seller Every ManÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s Battle, now focus on the temptations young single Christian men like you face every dayÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“and they offer workable, biblical strategies for achieving sexual purity.

Every Young ManÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s Battle will show you how to train your eyes and your mind, how to clean up your thought life, and how to develop a realistic battle plan for remaining pure in todayÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s sexually soaked culture. The video also features a portion of the interview from Dr. James Dobson conducted with serial killer Ted Bundy.
